<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bloodthirsty](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1297)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 42

**Price** 8,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a slashing or piercing melee weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The magic in this rune sings in time with your attacks and coaxes you into finishing your opponent. When you critically hit a target that's taking [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), your target becomes [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10).

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> envision;   **Trigger** You reduce a creature to 0 Hit Points with the weapon;  **Effect** You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to twice the creature's level. These Hit Points remain for 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Bloodthirsty
